column4: anyone know how i can get the openoffice.org-headless package on 11.10? it doesnt seem to be in the repository
if you want it, you'll have to upgrade your ubuntu
nvm, irt doesnt exist in precise either, i was too fast
it says here: "You need to install the openoffice.org package as well as the openoffice.org-headless and openoffice.org-java-common . This one caught me for a while too." java-common is in the repos
